Classes in com.soa.message.handler used by com.soa.message.handler
HandlerContext
          Provides a HandlerFactory some context about the framework from where any constructed MessageHandler will be used.
HandlerErrorCode
          Constant error codes for the com.soa.message.handler package.
HandlerFactory
          The messaging engine will create MessageHandlers through HandlerFactory implementations.
HandlerRole
          Enumeration of MessageHandler roles, consumer and provider.
MessageContext
          The context of a message passed through the messaging engine.
MessageFaultException
          Exception to indicate a fault has been encountered that should be reported to the sender of a message.
MessageHandler
          Implementations of this interface are passed messages with additional context.
